trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_SEQ_00<tab>Nidhana regards you with those eyes you could drown in.
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Nidhana.
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Nidhana again.
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Nidhana yet again.
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_TODO_03<tab>Stand guard for Nidhana.
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Nidhana.
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Nidhana again.
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_000<tab>Hmm... You are a capable warrior too, are you not? Would you be amenable to assisting me with another errand?
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_001<tab>You see, our talisman requires the use of a special ink, but we have exhausted our stores of a key ingredient for it─spiritweed.

TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_002<tab>The herb grows not far from here, and I would like to go and harvest some. With the recent spate of kidnappings, however, we Arkasodara travel alone at our peril.
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_003<tab>Will you not come with me as my escort? I would compensate you for your troubles, of course.
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_004<tab>I'm in your debt! Without further ado, let us head to Kadjaya's Footsteps. It is situated on the road which runs east of the Great Work.
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_010<tab>I-I may simply be imagining it, but I feel as though we're being followed...
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_011<tab><gasp> Look out, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_BALLON_000_012<tab>Target found...
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_BALLON_000_013<tab>Subdue and capture...
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_020<tab>Gods, but that gave me a fright... To think that the moment I ventured outside the safety of the Work...
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_021<tab>Thank the Sisters I asked you to come with me. You're all right, I hope?
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_022<tab>Good, good. Let's continue on, then. It isn't far now─just through these pillars and up the rise.
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_030<tab>And here we are─Kadjaya's Footsteps.
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_031<tab>Kadjaya was a great dancer, and those who follow in her─well, you know─they come to this place to train and dedicate their dance to their ancestors.
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_032<tab>A happy benefit of this is that spiritweed grows here in abundance. I will set about harvesting at once, if you would be so good as to stand guard.
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_033<tab>The kidnappers aren't like to return soon, but better safe than sorry.
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_040<tab>I'll gather the herb as quickly as I can. Please stand guard for me.
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_050<tab>I have enough spiritweed to last us a good while. Thank you for keeping watch!
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_051<tab>Let us head back to the Great Work, shall we?
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_060<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, my thanks again for your assistance. With your help, we're that little bit closer to completing our talisman!
TEXT_AKTKMA117_04373_NIDHANA_000_061<tab>This isn't much, but please accept it as a token of my gratitude.
